topic: Discussing the related posts Module/Function and best way for it to actually work
text: set the channel topic: Discussing the related posts Module/Function and best way for it to actually work

posted this not because I thought I had the best solution to a problem but because I’m hoping  that it answers some questions that were had in the original thread as they did implement the blog_post_by_id part

If anyone disagrees with any part of my feedback or has better solutions chime in - we all want the best most useful related posts feature we can get.

heard back from Steven:
>>>Hi AJ, the ‘blog_post_ids’ parameter is given so that you can manually choose which blog_post to find find related posts for. A good example is if you have a landing page where you want to show blog posts that are related to a specific post you want. If you pass values to ‘blog_post_ids’ on a blog_post page, the widget will also find posts related to the given ‘blog_post_ids’ instead of the blog_post for the page - so it can act a sort of override. Does that makes sense?

i followed with this in the DM, thoughts on something like this?
>>>One question we all had was there an ability to override the pulling and let someone manually choose what posts to pull in (which can be id based also)
like a `post_ids_override` var which would then output only the posts listed in that var
From questions on the forums and ones i've been asked, it seems like this is a desired function for some related posts (the ability to manually choose the related posts that show or manually choose one or two)
so something like `always_show_post_ids` could be a var that would show the post ids in there but then if day they choose to have 4 related posts and only entered 3, the 4th would then be grabbed at random

Hey guys, unfortunately this isn’t possible to do with the widget at this moment but it shouldn’t be difficult to add in on our end. I’m out of the office today but I can clarify more details with you guys tomorrow :+1:
